chapter.title: SciDB Basic Analytic Capabilities
chapter.para: aggregates This chapter provides an overview of the basic analytic capabilities of SciDB. SciDB provides commands to group data from an array and calculate summaries over those groups. These commands are called aggregates.

In addition, SciDB also provides scalable operators to calculate order statistics of array data -- these include rank, avg_rank, and quantile, as well as the operator sort which rearranges array data and returns a vector of sorted items.
